dc.description.abstract[en_US]: Why, then, have most Indians not heard ofNICNET? Why did this futuristic network become a foot note in India's governance story? The answer is, alas, all too predictable-politics. Politics has singularly shaped the trajectory of technological advancement of India since Independence-and if the past is indeed a prologue, this coming decade will be no different.
